name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior VoIP Engineer with 13+ years of experience, specializing in **VoIP**, **SIP**, **PBX**, and **WebRTC** technologies. Proficient in implementing and maintaining **Amazon Connect** solutions and **AWS Lambda** functions, ensuring high-performance communication systems. Strong analytical skills demonstrated through the use of **WireShark** for protocol analysis and troubleshooting. Experienced in collaboration with cross-functional teams using **Jira Software**, **Confluence**, and design collaboration tools such as **Visio** and **Miro**. 

Additionally skilled in **Python** and bringing a robust background in full stack development with technologies such as **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and more. Proven track record in cloud-native architectures with **AWS** and **Azure**, alongside a solid understanding of compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Adept in leveraging Agile methodologies for effective project management.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** for developing customized VoIP solutions, employing frameworks such as **AWS Lambda** for scalable function-based architecture and seamless integration with **Amazon Connect** services.
Designed and implemented voice communication systems leveraging **SIP** protocols and **WebRTC**, ensuring high-quality audio and video performance in real-time.
Managed and configured **PBX** systems, utilizing **VoIP** best practices to enhance call quality and system reliability across multiple platforms.
Developed workflow diagrams using **Visio** and collaborated on project artifacts with **Miro** and **Confluence**, ensuring clear team communication and project alignment.
Led troubleshooting efforts with **WireShark** for packet analysis, significantly reducing call drop rates by **25%** through targeted optimizations and network adjustments.
Employed Agile methodologies in project management using **Jira Software**, facilitating iterative developments and timely deliverables across **9**+ projects.
Conducted training sessions for team members and stakeholders about VoIP systems and **AWS Lambda** integrations, leading to a **30%** increase in team efficiency.
Executed comprehensive testing strategies focusing on performance and reliability, utilizing tools like **Excel** for data analysis and metrics tracking.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to integrate VoIP systems with existing software solutions, maintaining a seamless user experience.
Documented system architectures and processes to maintain transparency and reference, ensuring compliance with internal standards and protocols.

Leverage **AWS Lambda** and **Amazon Connect** to create scalable voice solutions that integrate with existing VoIP systems, ensuring high availability and reliability.
Utilize **Python** scripts combined with **Visio** and **Miro** for designing and documenting VoIP architectures, facilitating better stakeholder understanding and project planning.
Implement and maintain **SIP**, **PBX**, and **SBC** configurations to enhance communication pathways, improving voice clarity and reducing latency by up to **30%**.
Conduct root cause analysis using **WireShark** and other monitoring tools to diagnose and resolve audio quality issues, ensuring service uptime above **99.9%**.
Lead agile project management initiatives using **Jira Software** and **Confluence**, driving cross-functional collaboration and timely delivery of VoIP solutions.
Facilitate training sessions on VoIP technologies, cultivating team skills and achieving a **25%** increase in onboarding efficiency.
Generate comprehensive reports using **Excel**, analyzing system performance metrics to inform strategic improvements and future investments in VoIP technology.

Utilized **Python** in the development and optimization of VoIP backend services, ensuring high availability and scalability across PBX and SBC modules to support real-time communication activities.
Engineered VoIP solutions incorporating **SIP** and **WebRTC** technologies, ensuring low latency and high-quality voice and video transmission for global telecommunication clients.
Implemented AWS-powered VoIP applications using **Amazon Connect** and **AWS Lambda**, enhancing workflow efficiency and optimizing operational costs by up to **30%**.
Analyzed network traffic and call quality using **Wireshark**, resolving issues related to packet loss and jitter, thus maintaining optimal service levels for over **1,000** concurrent users.
Developed dynamic diagrams and workflows for VoIP systems with **Visio** and **Miro**, streamlining project planning and integration processes across teams and leading to a **25%** increase in project delivery speed.
Collaborated in an Agile environment using tools like **Jira Software** and **Confluence**, facilitating sprint planning and documentation for efficient project tracking and communication.
Conducted comprehensive performance testing and optimization of VoIP systems, resulting in a **15%** reduction in call setup time and improved overall user experience.
Championed role-based access control (RBAC) frameworks and security protocols to safeguard VoIP applications, ensuring GDPR compliance and protecting sensitive user data across the platform.
Leveraged advanced data analysis skills using **Excel** to evaluate VoIP performance metrics, driving continuous improvements and enhancement strategies for system efficiency.
